name: Alone In The Dark web
description:
A small vertical slice of a game id like to make in the future, this is only a 5 minute experience and needs a lot of work.
Mechanics & Features:
-Destructible Environment, right now only crates and window are destructible but but it would be a focused on mechanic in the future.
-Shadows & Lighting, I want to play around with shadows and lighting for this game to create a cool atmosphere. Still needs a lot of work.
-Gun Crafting, crafting make shift guns to defend yourself. This has been cut from this version to meet game jam deadline.
Please comment and rate, feedback is extremely important. Good or bad it is all useful!
